DOC.brief_summary: This study INCB054329 give patient advanced malignancy conduct three treatment group . Each treatment group two part ; dose escalation ( Part 1 ) expansion ( Part 2 ) .
DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label , Dose-Escalation Study INCB054329 Patients With Advanced Malignancies
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis advance malignancy : Treatment Group A ( TGA ) : Part 1 : Any advanced solid tumor lymphoma ; Part 2 : Histologically confirm disease specific tumor type Treatment Group B ( TGB ) : Leukemia ( Part 2 acute myeloid leukemia [ AML ] ) , myelodysplastic syndrome ( MDS ) , myelodysplastic /myeloproliferative neoplasm ( MDS/MPN ) myelofibrosis ( MF ) Treatment Group C ( TGC ) : Multiple myeloma Progressed follow least 1 line prior therapy approve therapy available demonstrate prolong survival ( include subject intolerant approve therapy ) Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 0 1 Inadequate hematopoietic , liver , endocrine renal function Receipt anticancer medication investigational drug within follow interval first administration study drug : < 6 week mitomycinC nitrosoureas < 28 day investigational agent ( indication ) < 5 halflives anticancer medication , sponsor approval Prior radiotherapy within 2 week prior first dose study drug Untreated brain central nervous system ( CNS ) metastasis
